channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How to Build a PC (2025): Hardware Suggestions, Instructions, and More
item.description: Assembling a computer yourself is a good way to learn how they work.

item.title: The Trump administration’s big Intel investment comes from already awarded grants

item.description: You’re an action hero, and you need a camera to match. We guide you through all the models, plus accessory recommendations and hidden software tricks ...

item.title: Scientists Have Identified the Origin of an Extraordinarily Powerful Outer Space Radio Wave
item.description: In March 2025 the Earth was hit by a fast radio burst as energetic as the sun, but lasting only milliseconds.

item.title: Amazon AGI Labs chief defends his reverse acquihire

item.title: Meta partners with Midjourney on AI image and video models
